Contact Information

Correspondence for the Durham Town Council may be sent to its attention as below:

Administrator's Office
8 Newmarket Road
Durham, NH 03824
603-868-5571
kedwards@ci.durham.nh.us

Alternatively, if you wish contact ALL MEMBERS of the Council by email, please direct your correspondence to council@ci.durham.nh.us
